sect2.title: Memory container interface
sect2.para: Memory container provides the following methods:

sect3.title: getRef() method
sect3.para: getRef() method retorns reference to the object value.
Movable objects are loaded from swap at this moment if it's necessary. It may cause swapping of other object.
